events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product I got is not what I purchased.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product instead of the one ordered.
The case was assigned to a customer support agent specializing in refund and returns to handle the request efficiently.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a clear photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of the product I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid label to return the incorrect product at no cost.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. The prepaid label will make it easy to return the wrong item. Thank you!
Your refund has been processed, and the return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please send the item back within 14 days to complete the process.
We are following up to ensure that you received the refund and return label and that everything went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting customer support. We hope to assist you again in the future.
